title: Gold price forecast and predictions for 2025-2026
paragraphs: According to Goldman Sachs, gold prices will reach $2,300 by 2025. According to Bank of America analysts, prices may test $2,500 if inflation stays high and the Fed pauses rate hikes. However, Citigroup shows a more cautious picture, with analysts predicting that gold will remain near $2,200 (unless something big happens like a war).
Now, looking ahead to 2026, the predictions are pretty wide-ranging. It’s hard to forecast that far ahead as anything can happen between now and then. Here’s what the experts are saying:
title_original: Gold price forecast and predictions for 2025-2026
